update dbo.SYS_FLOORS set SERIAL_NO = #{serialNo,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SERIAL_NAME = #{serialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLOOR_CODE = #{floorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLOOR_NAME = #{floorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DEL = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
